name: Pato Chronicles 1:Denki the Duck VS Zinord(Demo)
name_original: Pato Chronicles 1:Denki the Duck VS Zinord(Demo)
description:
Pato Chronicles 1:Denki the Duck VS Zinord(Demo) is a platformer game developed by Pato_Gato. It came out on 08-09-2022.
Pato Chronicles 1:Denki the Duck VS Zinord(Demo) is available on Web, Linux, macOS and PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
